title: Coleen Rooney’s ‘Wagatha Christie’ saga is the only thing uniting the country
text:
Wagatha Christie, they’re calling it. A veritable ‘Roodunit’. A high opera, bel canto Footballer’s Wives reboot for the 21st century.

The current spat between duelling divas Coleen Rooney, the 33-year-old wife of Wayne, and Rebekah Vardy, 37-year-old spouse of Jamie, is quite simply the most exquisite piece of absurdist theatre since Greta Thunberg tried to assassinate Donald Trump with a death stare.

Is it any coincidence that BBC thriller The Capture has just ended and the new series Line of Duty has yet to be screened? I think not. Into the void has come an extraordinary spectacle that has united the nation after three years of acrimonious division.

Forget Leave and Remain: are you Team Coleen...
